pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.4: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.5: 96. The training rule on not wearing a chest wrap
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.2: a nun had gone to the village for alms without wearing her chest wrap.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.3: While she was walking along a street, a whirlwind lifted up her upper robes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.6: Because she was teased by those people, she felt humiliated.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.7: After returning to the nuns’ dwelling place, she told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.8: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.9: “How could a nun enter an inhabited area without wearing her chest wrap?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.10: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.15: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.16.1: ‘If a nun enters an inhabited area without wearing her chest wrap, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.8: it is for the purpose of concealing the body below the collar bone and above the navel.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.10: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed inhabited area, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.11: If she enters the vicinity of an unenclosed inhabited area, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.9: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.10: The thirteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.11: The ninth sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.14: “Venerables, the one hundred and sixty-six rules on confession have been recited.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.15: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.21: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.22: The section on minor rules has been completed.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.23: The chapter on offenses entailing confession in the nuns’ analysis is finished.
